get.description:
Fetches a list of all capstone titles
NonAdmin: only from previous the period
Admin : all titles

post.description: Submits and registers a new capstone title for the upcoming period

patch.description: Updates the details of a registered title

get.description:
Retrieves the complete and detailed information for a single capstone title
NonAdmin: cannot see proposal_url except the owner or the submission is accepted
Admin : retrieve all data

delete.description:
Permanently deletes a specific capstone title
Nonadmin : cannot use this

get.description:
Fetches a list of all capstone title submissions
Nonadmin : only submission from and to user team
Admin : all submission

Retrieves the complete and detailed information for a single submission
NonAdmin: only submission from and to user team
Admin : all submission

delete.description:
Deletes a specific submission
Nonadmin : cannot use this

post.summary: Submit a Proposal for a Title
post.description: Allows captain team to submit their project proposal for a chosen title
Allows a captain team to respond to a team's submission by either accepting or rejecting it

get.description:
Fetches a list of all team
Nonadmin : cannot use this
Fetches the public profile and member list for a specific team

delete.description:
Deletes an entire team and its associated data
Nonadmin : cannot use this

post.summary: Join a Team via Invite Code
post.description: Allows user to become a member of an existing team

delete.description: Remove a specific member from their team

post.description:
Creates one or more new teams for a capstone period
Nonadmin : cannot use this

get.description: Retrieves the complete profile information for the currently authenticated user
Fetches the public profile information for a specific user

delete.description:
Removes a user account
Nonadmin : cannot use this

patch.description: Updates the profile information for the authenticated user

get.description:
Retrieves a list of all users
Nonadmin : cannot use this

post.summary: Sign In with Email and Password
post.description: Authenticates a user and creates a new session using their registered email and password credentials

post.summary: Sign Up with Email and Password
post.description: Registers a new user account in the system using an email and password
Logs out the currently authenticated user and invalidates their session token

get.description: Initiates the OAuth 2.0 flow to allow a user to sign in or sign up using their Google account
